thread.title: Kevin Roeder
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Kevin Roeder

author: Kevin Roeder
title: Kevin Roeder
text: Costa Rican Vacations handled all the planning and reservations including transportation which is a big deal for you veteran travelers. In addition the choice of accomodations and excurtions were excellent. When clogged traffic forced us to miss a flight Costa Rican Vacations had a solution; in minutes. We were in awe. Their support was 24/7 and impeccable. When we return to Costa Rica we will use Costa Rican Vacations without question.
